mc_questions.question: Which of the following statements is GENERALLY true of testing?
answers: A. Testing can show the presence of defects.
B. Testing reduces the probability of uncovered defects.
C. Testing can show that a previously present defect has been removed.
D. Testing can prove that software is defect free.

mc_questions.question: A manifestation of an ‘error’ in software is:
Which set of metrics can be used for monitoring of the test execution?
answers: A. Number of test cases run / not run; test cases passed / failed
B. Number of detected defects, testing cost
C. Number of residual defects in the test object
D. Percentage of completed tasks in the preparation of test environment; test cases prepared
